mutants.code:
def swap_variables(a, b):
    """
    Swaps the values of two variables a and b without using a temporary variable.
    
    Args:
        a (any): The first variable to swap.
        b (any): The second variable to swap.
    
    Returns:
        tuple: A tuple containing the swapped values of a and b.
    """
    a = a - b
    b = a - b
    a = a - b
    return (a, b)

def swap_variables(a, b):
    """
    Swaps the values of two variables a and b without using a temporary variable.
    
    Args:
        a (any): The first variable to swap.
        b (any): The second variable to swap.
    
    Returns:
        tuple: A tuple containing the swapped values of a and b.
    """
    a = a * b
    b = a - b
    a = a - b
    return (a, b)

def swap_variables(a, b):
    """
    Swaps the values of two variables a and b without using a temporary variable.
    
    Args:
        a (any): The first variable to swap.
        b (any): The second variable to swap.
    
    Returns:
        tuple: A tuple containing the swapped values of a and b.
    """
    a = a + b
    b = a + b
    a = a - b
    return (a, b)

def swap_variables(a, b):
    """
    Swaps the values of two variables a and b without using a temporary variable.
    
    Args:
        a (any): The first variable to swap.
        b (any): The second variable to swap.
    
    Returns:
        tuple: A tuple containing the swapped values of a and b.
    """
    a = a + b
    b = a * b
    a = a - b
    return (a, b)

def swap_variables(a, b):
    """
    Swaps the values of two variables a and b without using a temporary variable.
    
    Args:
        a (any): The first variable to swap.
        b (any): The second variable to swap.
    
    Returns:
        tuple: A tuple containing the swapped values of a and b.
    """
    a = a + b
    b = a - b
    a = a + b
    return (a, b)

def swap_variables(a, b):
    """
    Swaps the values of two variables a and b without using a temporary variable.
    
    Args:
        a (any): The first variable to swap.
        b (any): The second variable to swap.
    
    Returns:
        tuple: A tuple containing the swapped values of a and b.
    """
    a = a + b
    b = a - b
    a = a * b
    return (a, b)
